attributes.action: Investigate Tony Blair advice to R Brooke's to 'issue a Hutton style inquiry report'.
attributes.additional_details: we already know that a 'Hutton style inquiry report' is one where the inquiry lead is given the findings and recommendations by the convening authority BEFORE the inquiry conducts its business.  This proves misconduct in a public office by Tony Blair and he now needs to be arraigned before a court of law in this country. Your refusal to do this will confirm our consensus that the protection of criminals by our political classes which allowed Jimmy Savile to abuse children for over 50 years, prevails.
